title: Shin Shirayuki-hime Densetsu Prétear
synopsis: Due to her father's remarriage, robust 16-year-old Himeno Awayuki moves into a large mansion with a beautiful garden—the quintessential dream house for any girl her age. However, much to Himeno's disappointment, her new stepfamily doesn't really seem to like her, as her stepmother often occupies herself with her father, her younger stepsister Mawata ignores her, and her other stepsister—the equally aged Mayune—tries to prank her at every opportunity.
voices: ['Toriumi, Kousuke', 'Yoshida, Sayuri', 'Sakurai, Takahiro', 'Horie, Yui', 'Nakanishi, Tamaki', 'Kanda, Akemi', 'Naruse, Makoto', 'Yajima, Akiko', 'Yukino, Satsuki', 'Morikubo, Shoutarou']
staff: [['Satou, Junichi', ['Director', ' Storyboard', ' Original Creator']], ['Sayama, Kiyoko', ['Director', ' Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Tanaka, Hideyuki', ['Sound Director']], ['Kosaka, Harume', ['Episode Director']]]
